    ("age", "medium", "He is a 20-year-old male."),

    ("height", "low", "He is 5 feet 9 inches."),
    ("weight", "low", "He weighs 199 lbs."),

    ("education", "low", "He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college."),

    ("drug use", "medium", "He has used drugs (marijuana) in the past four years."),

  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 90
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 9 inches and weighs 199 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 3 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 5. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
